title: Family representative: Lamar Odom leaves Las Vegas hospital by helicopter, is in Los Angeles
text:
Home » News » Sports » Other Sports » Family representative: Lamar Odom… Family representative: Lamar Odom leaves Las Vegas hospital by helicopter, is in Los Angeles By The Associated Press October 20, 2015 10:26 am 
LAS VEGAS (AP) — Family representative: Lamar Odom leaves Las Vegas hospital by helicopter, is in Los Angeles. Topics:
